page.title: 03RUTHVEN BARRACKS - 2
page.content:
This site was a popular one for {castles}as far back as the thirteenth century although the Barracks as we see them today were built in 1715 amidst{Jacobite Risings.} Soldiers were stationed there to patrol Wade's roads and keep the Highlanders in order.
In recent years{restoration}work has gone on making the building much safer for visitors. In 1985 a{well}has been uncovered in the courtyard.
{Barbeques and folk singing}nights have been held here in recent years. A{son {et lumiere}was tried by a local trades association but the squally night spoiled the fun for participants and audience alike.
